error_details.explanation: Incorrect final answer. The student forgot to subtract the bracelets that Bingley gave to his little sister (he gave 9/3=3 to her, so he actually has 9-3=6 bracelets remaining).

#### 9
Kelly gives Bingley 16 / 4 = <<16/4=4>>4 bracelets
So in total, Bingley has 5 + 4 = <<5+4=9>>9 bracelets
